page.title: 02Housing in North St.Helens
page.content: Most of the housing was concentrated in the south and east of our block. There was a large amount of farming in the rest of it. Around {Eccleston}and {Windle}there were new housing estates with housing ranging from Â£30,000 upwards.Mostly they are semi_detached but there are some detached.There are some bungalows.Mixed in are some older houses with a row of 100 year old cottages in Rainford Road. Near{Billinge}and {Moss Bank}there is a large council estate dating from the post war era.Around{Cowley Hill, and {Dentons Green}. Here are several roads of pre 1945 terraced houses many of whose occupants used to works at the nearby Pilkington works . A few very large detached houses from the last century are situated in the rural north surrounded by landscaped gardens. {
